changeOnSelect.description: change value on each selection if set to true, see above demo for details
changeOnSelect.description_zh: 当此项为 true 时，点选每级菜单选项值都会发生变化，具体见上面的演示

displayRender.description: render function of displaying selected options, you can use slot="displayRender" and slot-scope="{labels, selectedOptions}"
displayRender.description_zh: 选择后展示的渲染函数,可使用 slot="displayRender" 和 slot-scope="{labels, selectedOptions}"

expandTrigger.description: expand current item when click or hover, one of 'click' 'hover'
expandTrigger.description_zh: 次级菜单的展开方式，可选 'click' 和 'hover'

:fieldNames.description: custom field name for label and value and children
:fieldNames.description_zh: 自定义 options 中 label name children 的字段

getPopupContainer.description: Parent Node which the selector should be rendered to. Default to body. When position issues happen, try to modify it into scrollable content and position it relative.
getPopupContainer.description_zh: 菜单渲染父节点。默认渲染到 body 上，如果你遇到菜单滚动定位问题，试试修改为滚动的区域，并相对其定位。

loadData.description: To load option lazily, and it cannot work with showSearch
loadData.description_zh: 用于动态加载选项，无法与 showSearch 一起使用

notFoundContent.description: Specify content to show when no result matches.
notFoundContent.description_zh: 当下拉列表为空时显示的内容

popupPlacement.description: use preset popup align config from builtinPlacements：bottomLeft bottomRight topLeft topRight
popupPlacement.description_zh: 浮层预设位置：bottomLeft bottomRight topLeft topRight

showSearch.description: Whether show search input in single mode.
showSearch.description_zh: 在选择框中显示搜索框

size.description: input size, one of large default small
size.description_zh: 输入框大小，可选 large default small

:suffixIcon.description_zh: 自定义的选择框后缀图标

events.name: popupVisibleChange
events.description: callback when popup shown or hidden

showSearch.name: filter
showSearch.description: 接收 `inputValue` `path` 两个参数，当 `path` 符合筛选条件时，应返回 true，反之则返回 false。

showSearch.name: matchInputWidth
showSearch.description: 搜索结果列表是否与输入框同宽

showSearch.name: render
showSearch.description: 用于渲染 filter 后的选项,可使用 #showSearchRender="{inputValue, path}"

showSearch.name: sort
showSearch.description: 用于排序 filter 后的选项
